DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate impact bleed event patient UK non-valvular atrial fibrillation ( NVAF ) treat vitamin K antagonist ( VKA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Economic Burden Bleeding Events Patients UK With Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation Treated With Vitamin k Antagonists
DOC.criteria: For CPRDHES cohort , patient include meet criterion : Have CPRD data link HES Have AF diagnosis ( base Read code CPRD ICD10 cod HES ) treat VKA study period ≥18 year old index date CPRD acceptability quality criterion present . For CPRD cohort , patient include meet follow criterion : Have Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) diagnosis ( base Read code CPRD ) treat VKAs study period ≥18 year old index date CPRD acceptability quality criterion present . For two cohort interest , patient exclude meet follow criterion : Fewer 12 month computerise data available prior index date ( order provide minimum amount computerise history avoid issue associate updating record patient join practice ) . The date start computerize record latter patient 's date registration practice practice 's UptoStandard ( UTS ) date ( practice deem contribute data adequate quality ) The practice UTS , patient deem `` unacceptable '' accord CPRD 's quality criterion There evidence valvular disease , repair , replacement ( ie , 12 month prior index date ) study period There record Novel anticoagulant ( NOAC )
